text: Would you look who it is! I almost wasn't expecting to see you again.

Oh, don't get me wrong - it's a very welcome 
surprise. You seem a touch more confident this time, too.
Now that's a good answer! You take to this quickly.

And here I was looking forward to a startled noise or two! 
...Kidding, kidding.

Too bad, you are. Quit groaning about it or I'll 
treat you to the groans of the damned next time you sleep.

But hey, now that you're seeing the world through eerier 
eyes, we can hit the town in the dead of night. What do you want 
to do next?
Ooooh, you really are speaking my language now!

I was right to act on that potential I saw in you. 
I'm having even more fun than I thought I'd have!
Starting slow, eh? Nothing wrong with that I suppose.

You're shaping up to be one hell of a haunted house! 
Let's see this through to the end.

Booooooooring. All the cool, scary haunted house things to 
do and you pick sleeping!?

You know, I was actually starting to get invested in this 
whole thing we have going. Turns out you're no fun after all.
